    • Uses of Feature in net.starype.minigameapi.features.polyvalent

      Classes in net.starype.minigameapi.features.polyvalent that implement Feature 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JoinLeaveManager
      JoinLeaveManager is a class that can be used as a feature alone or as an under feature depending of the GameDivision instance, to manage connections and disconnections of players.
      class  RespawnManager
      RespawnManager is a Polyvalent Feature, therefore it that can be used as a feature alone or as a sub feature depending of the GameDivision instance, to manage respawns of players.
      Methods in net.starype.minigameapi.features.polyvalent that return types with arguments of type Feature

    • Uses of Feature in net.starype.minigameapi.features.standard

      Classes in net.starype.minigameapi.features.standard that implement Feature 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GameDivision
      GameDivision is feature allowing you to cut your game in different parts.
      class  TeamManager
      TeamManager is a simple Feature which allows you to add teams in your game.
